description:
How to apply nature principles, laws, rhythms and emotional self-awareness, consciousness for time management?

FOR WHOM?

  • This e-learning program is dedicated to entrepreneurs, free lancers, teams, communities, house-parents, single parents, students and artists that wish to advance their time management skills, business/project management and team work.

BENEFITS

  • Time management will make a difference not only for your business, or family, but also for your personal development, self-knowledge, studies/education, family, friendships, love relationships.
  • To have a balanced life is very important, there for the ability to integrate in your schedule free time, leisure, creative activities, intimacy, adventure, and space for unplanned and unexpected events or encounters in your life.

HOW TO ADVANCE YOUR TIME MANAGEMENT ?

  • This e-learning program offers you 17 Topics of study.
  • For each topyc a e-workbook for self-study is provided, based on questions, and answers (for research and self-reflection), with the reference of your daily life, family and business experience. Suggested activities will inspire you enhance your time management and help you learn by doing.
  • Every month, Luis will present to you new topycs and e-workbooks.


GAMIFIED

  • For every question you answer, video you watch, lesson with LUIS you complete, you will receive points.
  • Points can be also trade for gifts certificates if you complete the course.
title: Time Management & Emotions
